title: Constructivist-Based Embedded Systems Practical Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic C programming, understanding of digital logic circuits, and foundational experience with embedded platforms (e.g., Arduino)
context.additional_context: Constructivist approach emphasizing learner-defined problem-solving and solution implementation in practice-oriented settings. Project-based assessment accumulates real-world system development experience

learning_goals: Learners can design peripheral device control programs using embedded system development toolchains
Learners can implement an IoT prototype that solves real-world problems using a constructivist approach
Learners can debug and optimize system integration issues in a collaborative environment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
